name: Quadrilateral
description: A keyboard based window organizer for ChromeOS.

01-thirds-01.description: Thirds 01: Resize and move window to the left third of the screen.

02-thirds-02.description: Thirds 02: Resize and move window to the middle third of the screen.

03-thirds-03.description: Thirds 03: Resize and move window to the right third of the screen.

04-sixths-01.description: Sixths 01: Resize and move window to the top left sixth of the screen.

05-sixths-02.description: Sixths 02: Resize and move window to the top middle sixth of the screen.

06-sixths-03.description: Sixths 03: Resize and move window to the top right sixth of the screen.

07-sixths-04.description: Sixths 04: Resize and move window to the bottom left sixth of the screen.

08-sixths-05.description: Sixths 05: Resize and move window to the bottom middle sixth of the screen.

09-sixths-06.description: Sixths 06: Resize and move window to the bottom right sixth of the screen.

10-quarters-01.description: Quarters 01: Resize and move window to the top right quarter of screen.

11-quarters-02.description: Quarters 02: Resize and move window to the bottom right quarter of screen.

12-quarters-03.description: Quarters 03: Resize and move window to the bottom left quarter of screen.

13-quarters-04.description: Quarters 04: Resize and move window to the top left quarter of screen.

14-halves-01.description: Halves 01: Resize and move window to the top half of screen.

15-halves-02.description: Halves 02: Resize and move window to the bottom half of screen.

16-halves-03.description: Halves 03: Resize and move window to the left half of screen.

17-halves-04.description: Halves 04: Resize and move window to the right half of screen.
